addons.name: addons
addons.description:
The base module for the Core JS framework.
It provides helper methods for implementing OOP methodologies and basic utilities such as browser detection.

core.name: core
core.description:
The base module for the Core JS framework.
It provides helper methods for implementing OOP methodologies and basic utilities such as browser detection.

core.EventBroadcaster.name: core.EventBroadcaster
core.EventBroadcaster.description:
** Singleton. **
Allows a global object to be utilized for broadcasting events.

** Example: ** 
EventBroadcaster.instance().on("eventName", scope._("someEvent"), scope);

params.name: opts
params.description: An object containing configurations required by the Core derived class.

core.EventDispatcher.name: core.EventDispatcher
core.EventDispatcher.description: The main class that implements broadcaster pattern. Ideally subclassed by objects that will perform broadcasting functions.

params.name: opts
params.description: An object containing configurations required by the Core derived class.

props.name: el
props.description:
The node element included in the class composition.
TODO: Refactor and simplify listening function - something like this.on("EVENT", method); but still retain garbage collection

core.Module.name: core.Module
core.Module.description: The base object of all core based classes. Every object created within the Core framework derives from this class.

params.name: opts
params.description: An object containing configurations required by the Core derived class.

props.name: el
props.description: The node element included in the class composition.

core.addons.webapp.LocalStorage.name: core.addons.webapp.LocalStorage
core.addons.webapp.LocalStorage.description:
** Singleton. **
The main class that implements local storage functionalities on a web application. This class wraps multiple storage mechanisms for storing information on the client side.

** This class supports the following: **
- SessionStorage - LocalStorage - WebSQL

params.name: opts
params.description: An object containing configurations required by the Core derived class.

props.name: el
props.description: The node element included in the class composition.

core.wirings.OfflineModule.name: core.wirings.OfflineModule
core.wirings.OfflineModule.description:
The main class that implements offline webapp functionalities using application cache and local storage.
Extends core.wirings.Module to have the ability to be instantiated in the same fashion.

params.name: opts
params.description: An object containing configurations required by the Core derived class.

props.name: el
props.description: The node element included in the class composition.

classitems.description: Created by donaldmartinez on 13/05/15.
Checks the array of listeners for existing scopes.
classitems.name: containsScope

params.name: list
params.description: Reference to the array of subscribed listeners

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope being queried for existence

return.description: Returns boolean indicating the existence of the scope passed on the parameters

classitems.description: Private method handler for event registration.
classitems.name: register

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name being added on the listener list.

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope of the event handler

params.name: method
params.description: The method used by the scope to handle the event being broadcasted

params.name: once
params.description: Specify whether the event should only be handled once by the scope and its event handler

classitems.description: Subscribe function. Called when adding a subscriber to the broadcasting object.
classitems.name: on

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name being subscribed to

params.name: method
params.description: The method handler to trigger when the event specified is dispatched.

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope of the event handler

classitems.description: Subscribe once function. Called when adding a subscriber to the broadcasting object.
classitems.name: once

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name being subscribed to

params.name: method
params.description: The method handler to trigger when the event specified is dispatched.

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope of the event handler

classitems.description: Private method handler for unregistering events
classitems.name: unregister

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name being added on the listener list.

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope of the event handler

params.name: method
params.description: The method used by the scope to handle the event being broadcasted

params.name: once
params.description: Specify whether the event should only be handled once by the scope and its event handler

classitems.description: Unsubscribe function. Called when removing a subscriber from the broadcasting object.
classitems.name: off

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name unsubscribing from.

params.name: method
params.description: The method handler to trigger when the event specified is dispatched.

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope of the event handler

classitems.description: Unsubscribe function - scope context. Unsubscribes a specific scope from ALL events
classitems.name: removeScope

params.name: scope
params.description: Reference to the scope subscriber being removed.

classitems.description: Removes all items from the listener list.
classitems.name: removeAll

classitems.description: Broadcast functions. Triggers a broadcast on the EventDispatcher/derived object.
classitems.name: trigger

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name to trigger/broadcast.

params.name: variables
params.description: An object to send upon broadcast

classitems.description: Added support for older browser. Only applied when the method is not available. Returns a scope bound function.
classitems.name: bind

params.name: scope
params.description: The scope where the function is bound to

classitems.description: Utility method for implementing prototypal inheritance within the core framework.
classitems.name: inherits

params.name: obj
params.description: The object where the prototype is going to be derived from.

classitems.description: Utility method for implementing mixins/augmentation/partial in the core framework
classitems.name: mixin

params.name: obj
params.description: The object where the prototype is going to be mix with.

classitems.description: Stored browser information based on the detection algorithm implemented within core.
classitems.name: browser

classitems.description: Utility method for generating GUID
classitems.name: GUID

classitems.description: Utility method for getting the bounding rect of the dom element - also adds support for IE8
classitems.name: rect

return.description: Object Contains the rectangular information of a HTMLElement

classitems.description: Utility method for exposing objects in a namespaced fashion.
classitems.name: registerNamespace

classitems.description: Utility method for referencing objects within the core framework. This also adds existence checking for the objects being referenced on import.
classitems.name: import

params.name: package
params.description: The namespace of the object being imported.

classitems.description: Utility method for performing dependency checks on core classes.
classitems.name: dependency

params.name: object
params.description: The object to check if its defined.

params.name: message
params.description: The message to display on warning when the object passed for checking is undefined.

classitems.description: The selected HTML element node reference.
classitems.name: node

classitems.description: Property for storing proxied function/methods
classitems.name: proxyHandlers

classitems.description: Returns a scope bound function and stores it on the proxyHandlers property.
classitems.name: getProxyHandler

params.name: method
params.description: The string equivalent of the defined method name of the class.

return.description: The scope bound function defined on the parameter.

classitems.description: Core method for clearing proxied function methods.
classitems.name: clearProxyHandler

params.name: method
params.description: The string equivalent of the defined method to clear.

classitems.description: Core method initialization. This is called automatically on core sub classes.
classitems.name: construct

params.name: options
params.description: The object passed on the constructor of a core based class.

classitems.description:
Core method initialization. This is called automatically on core sub classes. Adds delay when being called automatically, this allows
time to setup all the other classes and manage the sequence of instantiations.
classitems.name: delayedConstruct

params.name: options
params.description: The object passed on the constructor of a core based class.

classitems.description: Core method for destroying/cleaning up objects.
classitems.name: dispose

params.name: removeNode
params.description: If true and there is a node attached in the class (el property) that element is going to be removed upon disposal.

classitems.description: Core method for searching sub node elements.
classitems.name: find

params.name: selector
params.description: The selector used for searching sub nodes.

return.description: An array of HTMLElements, please note that this is not jQuery selected nodes.

classitems.description: Core method for searching sub node elements within the document context.
classitems.name: findAll

params.name: selector
params.description: The selector used for searching sub nodes within the document.

return.description: An array of HTMLElements, please note that this is not jQuery selected nodes.

classitems.description: Retrieves the distance from the last detected position. Returns distance result in km.
classitems.name: getDistanceFromCurrentLocation

params.name: point
params.description: An object containing latitude and longitude properties.

props.name: latitude
props.description: The latitude of the value to calculate distance.

props.name: longitude
props.description: The longitude of the value to calculate distance.

classitems.description: Calculates the distance between 2 coordinates.

params.description: An object containing latitude and longitude properties.

props.name: latitude
props.description: The latitude of the value to calculate distance.

props.name: longitude
props.description: The longitude of the value to calculate distance.

params.name: point2
params.description: An object containing latitude and longitude properties.

props.name: latitude
props.description: The latitude of the value to calculate distance.

props.name: longitude
props.description: The longitude of the value to calculate distance.

classitems.description: Refreshes current location and last known location. Runs geolocation check again.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Method for storing key/value pair using local storage.
classitems.name: storeLocal

params.name: key
params.description: The key to use when storing values

params.name: value
params.description: The value to store paired with the key parameter

classitems.description: Method for retrieving values in local storage.
classitems.name: retrieveLocal

params.name: key
params.description: The key pair to use when retrieving values

classitems.description: Method for storing key/value pair using session storage.
classitems.name: storeSession

params.name: value
params.description: The value to store paired with the key parameter

params.name: key

classitems.description: Method for creating tables on WebSQL
classitems.name: createTable

params.name: tablename
params.description: The table name to use upon creation

params.name: structure
params.description: The columns to use when creating table

classitems.description: Method for inserting data on WebSQL
classitems.name: insertSql

params.name: query
params.description: The string INSERT query to use upon insertion

classitems.description: Method for retrieving data on WebSQL
classitems.name: retrieveSql

params.name: query
params.description: The string SELECT query to use upon retrieval

classitems.description: Method for configuring WebSQL, this includes database creation and all other meta information required on creation
classitems.name: configureSQL

params.name: dbname
params.description: The name of the database to create

params.name: version
params.description: The version of the database to create

params.name: desc
params.description: The description of the database to create

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the database to create, uses bytes. (ie. 1024*1024 * [intended mb size])

classitems.description: The main method handler for checking the application status. Also determines if a web application has gone offline/online
classitems.name: onApplicationCacheStatus

params.name: event
params.description: Contains the information about the current application cache status.

classitems.description: Virtual protected function. Should be overridden on subclasses. Called automatically when the cache status has changed.
classitems.name: cacheStatus

params.name: status
params.description: The status of the application cache.

classitems.description: Virtual protected function. Should be overridden on subclasses. Called automatically when the online/offline state of the application changes.
classitems.name: onlineStatus

params.name: isonline
params.description: True/false depending on the applications online/offline state.
